DOC.brief_summary: Cross-sectional, one visit study. All the data will be collected through questionnaires. Descriptives statistics will be applied to the data. 832 patients will participate to the study and 104 physicians.
DOC.brief_title: Opinion of Patients Under Treatment That Meets the Criteria of New Treatment Strategy According to GINA 2006
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnosed with persistent asthma (GINA 2005) for at least 6 months before entering the study Patients who are under treatment according to the new strategies described in GINA 2006 for at least 3 months before entering the study Patients who are not willing to sign the Informed Consent Form COPD Patients
